listing.notes: CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SMASH UP SCIENCE DOUBLE FEATURE: $13.95 Alderac Entertainment Group [AEG 5504] * Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s anticipate release date: March 2014 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD
English first edition Publisher: Alderac Entertainment Group

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5504) Smash Up is back with even more wild factions in the mix! Science Fiction Double Feature brings four new decks to the base-smashing business with abilities unlike those seen before. Time Travelers allow you to reuse your cards time and time again. Cyborg Apes take actions that attach to your minions to a whole new level. Super Spies use their mojo in espionage to plot out the future of you and your opponents, while finally the Shapeshifters could be anyone... Science Fiction Double Feature is an expansion to the wildly popular card game Smash Up. This expansion features enough for two players right out of the box, and can be combined with any Smash Up set to support up to 4 players.

Like New condition. Shipping £4.50 with Collect+ or MyHermes. Happy to meet in SW or central London to save on shipping costs. Main game and other expansions are available separately (main game is £12 if bought without expansions - see my listing). There is a discount for multiple purchases.

Cyborg Apes take actions that attach to your minions to a whole new level. Science Fiction Double Feature is an expansion to the wildly popular card game Smash Up. This expansion features enough for two players right out of the box, and can be combined with any Smash Up set to support up to 4 players.
Cards in pristine condition. Includes cardboard organizer and original tokens.
